header_text: You are going on a long walk tomorrow with a friend who walks a long distance every day. You have not been on a long walk in quite some time, and worry if you can keep up or not.

elements.Text: Will you be able to keep up with your friend tomorrow?

elements.name: You are going on a long walk tomorrow with a friend who walks a long distance every day. You have not been on a long walk in quite some time, and worry if you can keep up or not._Physical Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
